title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3-in-1 AR-Powered Learning Kit)

**Product Description:**

Unlock a world of fun-filled learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu. This comprehensive 3-in-1 kit combines Plugo Count, Plugo Letters, and Plugo Link, providing an immersive AR-powered learning experience that develops essential math, linguistic, and problem-solving skills in children aged 4-10 years.

**Key Features:**

* 3 interactive Plugo kits: Count, Letters, and Link
* 1 foldable Plugo Gamepad with a device slot and embedded magnets
* Compatible with iOS, Android, and Amazon Fire devices (check compatibility details below)
* Free Plugo app with 15 interactive games and 750+ levels, designed for adaptive learning from Pre-K to Grade 4
* Develops essential skills in math, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills

**Educational Value:**

The Plugo STEM Pack is carefully designed to provide a comprehensive learning experience that covers various aspects of STEM education, including:

* Math: Develops counting, arithmetic, and problem-solving skills
* Engineering: Encourages creativity and critical thinking through puzzle-solving and block-building activities
* Linguistic Abilities: Enhances vocabulary, spelling, and comprehension skills through interactive games and exercises

**Compatibility Details:**

* iOS: Compatible with iPhone 6 and above, iPad 5th Gen and above (exceptions: iPad Mini 1, iPad Pro 12.9")
* Android: Requires Android 8 and above, 2GB RAM, and a front camera positioned at the top centre (unsupported: 10" screen tablets and above)
* Amazon Fire: Compatible with Fire 7 (2022), Fire 8 (2018 & 2020), and Fire 8+ (2020)

**What's in the Box:**

* 3 Plugo kits (Count, Letters, and Link)
* 1 Plugo Gamepad
* Free Plugo app with 15 interactive games and 750+ levels

**Gift Suitability:**

The Plugo STEM Pack is an ideal gift for both boys and girls aged 4-10 years, perfect for developing their STEM skills and fostering a love for learning.

**Order Now and Give Your Child the Gift of STEM Education!**
